'''Aloy''' is a playable [[Cryo]] crossover [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the heroine from ''{{w|Horizon Zero Dawn}}'' and is introduced as a collaboration and crossover character between Guerrilla Games and [[HoYoverse]].

==Availability==
All Travelers who had reached [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above were able to claim Aloy for free directly through the in-game [[mail]]. PlayStation users were able to obtain Aloy early between Versions 2.1–2.2, while all platforms were eligible during [[Version 2.2]].<ref name="Howto" />
